fact.description: Today's referee, Cuneyt Cakir, has blown to start the match.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Brazil.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Mexico.
Mexico have been awarded a corner by Cuneyt Cakir.
Mexico to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
Throw-in for Brazil in their own half.
Free kick for Brazil in their own half.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
David Luiz (Brazil) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Mexico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Brazil's Fred has run offside.
Throw-in for Mexico at Estadio Castelao.
Free kick for Mexico in their own half.
Goal kick for Mexico at Estadio Castelao.
Brazil drive upfield and Fred gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Mexico defender.
Free kick for Brazil in the half of Mexico.
Throw-in for Brazil in the half of Mexico.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Brazil throw-in in Mexico's half.
Mexico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Brazil in the half of Mexico.
Throw-in for Brazil close to the penalty box.
Brazil's Luiz Gustavo misses with an attempt on goal.
Mexico have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fred of Brazil is pulled up for offside.
Can Brazil get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mexico's half?
Fred for the home team is judged to be offside.
Cuneyt Cakir awards the home team a throw-in.
Rafael Marquez is back on the pitch.
Cuneyt Cakir waits before resuming play because Rafael Marquez for Mexico is still down.
Cuneyt Cakir has blown to resume play in Fortaleza.
Mexico are pushing forward but Hector Herrera's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Brazil push upfield and Neymar gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Mexico defence.
Mexico are coming forward and Miguel Layun gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Cuneyt Cakir awards Brazil a goal kick.
Throw-in Mexico.
Oscar for Brazil drives towards goal at Estadio Castelao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Mexico in the half of Brazil.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Mexico throw-in in Brazil's half.
Can Brazil get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mexico's half?
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Cuneyt Cakir.
Fred (Brazil) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Mexico defenders.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Mexico.
Can Mexico capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Miguel Layun of Mexico gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Brazil goal kick.
Brazil's Marcelo breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Mexico at Estadio Castelao.
Luiz Gustavo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Brazil’s Luiz Gustavo is on his feet again at Estadio Castelao.
Play has been resumed.
Ball goes out of play for a Brazil goal kick.
Ball safe as Mexico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jose Vazquez for Mexico gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Cuneyt Cakir awards Brazil a goal kick.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Free kick Brazil.
Brazil to take a throw-in in Mexico territory.
In Fortaleza Brazil drive forward through Paulinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick in a good position for Mexico!
Ramires for Brazil has been booked by Cuneyt Cakir and receives a first yellow card.
Brazil have a goal kick.
Mexico to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the first half.
The first-half is over at Estadio Castelao.
Luiz Felipe Scolari is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Castelao with Bernard replacing Ramires.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Free kick Brazil.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Brazil's Oscar misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Ball goes out of play for a Brazil goal kick.
Andres Guardado (Mexico) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mexico have been awarded a corner by Cuneyt Cakir.
Mexico are pushing forward but Giovani Dos Santos's finish is wide of the goal.
Cuneyt Cakir awards Brazil a goal kick.
Giovani Dos Santos of Mexico smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Hector Herrera of Mexico gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Brazil at Estadio Castelao.
Free kick for Brazil in their own half.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Brazil.
Mexico's Paul Aguilar has been booked in Fortaleza.
Mexico's Andres Guardado gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Brazil have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Brazil in the half of Mexico.
Jose Vazquez (Mexico) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In Fortaleza Brazil attack through Neymar. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Throw-in high up the field for Brazil in Fortaleza.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Mexico.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Mexico throw-in in Brazil's half.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a throw-in for Mexico, close to Brazil's area.
Throw-in for Mexico in their own half.
Jo is replacing Fred for Brazil at Estadio Castelao.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Can Brazil get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mexico's half?
Mexico needs to be cautious. Brazil have an attacking throw-in.
Mexico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cuneyt Cakir awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Brazil in the half of Mexico.
Throw-in Mexico.
Javier Hernandez is on a sub for Oribe Peralta for Mexico.
Brazil are coming forward and Jo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Mexico at Estadio Castelao.
The away team replace Hector Herrera with Marco Fabian.
Free kick for Mexico in the half of Brazil.
Ball goes out of play for a Brazil goal kick.
Free kick Mexico.
Thiago Silva is booked for the home team.
In Fortaleza, Giovani Dos Santos of Mexico is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball safe as Brazil is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mexico to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
Brazil awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Mexico at Estadio Castelao.
Mexico make their third substitution with Raul Jimenez replacing Giovani Dos Santos.
The home team have replaced Oscar with Willian. This is the third substitution made today by Luiz Felipe Scolari.
Mexico will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Brazil.
Brazil drive forward and Thiago Silva gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Mexico have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Mexico in the half of Brazil.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Can Mexico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brazil's half?
Corner awarded to Mexico.
In Fortaleza Mexico attack through Andres Guardado. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Mexico have been awarded a corner by Cuneyt Cakir.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Brazil throw-in in Mexico's half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the second half.
Free kick for Mexico in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
